---
title: "Geometric Results Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rgeom-0.6.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Geom06Call <- stream_in(file("rgeom-0.6-Call-Revised-0409.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Geom06Result <- stream_in(file("rgeom-6_0409_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Geom.06.OpenAI <- left_join(Geom06Call,Geom06Result)
Full.Geom.06.0409 <- left_join(Geom06$params, Geom.06.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Geom.06.0409.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Geom.06.0409$Outcome <- map_chr(Geom06$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Geom06Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Geom.06.0409$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Geom.06.0409, file="Full.Geom.06.0409.RData")
```
